titles: A ioyful song of the royall receiuing of the Queenes most excellent Maiestie into her highnesse campe at Tilsburie in Essex: on Thursday and Fryday the eight and ninth of August. 1588 To the tune of Triumph and ioy.
author: T. I., fl. 1588.
publisher: Printed by Iohn W[olf]e for Richard Iones,
notes: A song - "Good English men whose valiant harts,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Elizabeth --  I, --  Queen of England, 1533-1603 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Elizabeth, 1558-1603 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
